transcript:
Customer: Haan usi pe call laga dijiye.



Hello.
Hello. Hello.
Executive: Ji very good evening Ankush ji.
Customer: 
Executive: Sir Pooja Sharma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise ho sir aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi vyast hu.
Executive: 
Customer: To mai contact kar lunga phone aapko.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi jaise hamara subah meeting hua tha aapse.
Customer: Thik hai. Aur maine aapko sari cheeze guide bhi ki thi meeting mein ki aapko kaise IndiaMART use karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi kuch cheeze aur samajhni hai.
Executive: Ki mai wapas aapko contact karke phir complete karunga hai na?
Executive: To sir aap bataiye agar abhi aap 10 minute de sakte hain to hum ek bar baat kar lete hain jo bhi aapko samajhna hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ghar mein bhi shadi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To abhi vyastata hai. Mai khud se contact kar lunga aapko.
Executive: To sir aisa karte hain abhi jo aapka ye ticket aaya hua hai IndiaMART pe, thik hai. Ye jo hai ticket mai close kar deti hu. Thik hai. Aap jo hai mai aapko apna whatsapp number bhi share kar deti hu. Aap jab bhi free ho jo bhi aapka suitable time ho phir uske baad hum meeting kar lenge. Kal bhi mai available hu, Sunday ko bhi hu. Aapko jab bhi lage aap mere ko call kar sakte ho. Mai aapko whatsapp pe personal number share kar deti hu.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai aapko jo bhi catalog mein correction karwana hai wo mai kar dungi sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To ye jo ticket hai ye close kar du mai aapka?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai aapko whatsapp pe bhi share kar deti hu aur ye ticket close kar deti hu. Aapke pass ek whatsapp pe aur mail pe feedback mail aayega mere liye to us pe aap satisfied pe click karke mujhe feedback de sakte hain. Baki sir mai aapko apna personal number share kar deti hu. Aapko koi bhi dikkat ho, kuch bhi janna ho, kuch bhi jankari update karani ho to aap direct mere ko usi number pe call kijiye. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai ji.
Executive: Okay sir okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to understand more things.

- Customer is busy due to a wedding.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the ticket.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting later.

- Executive offered to help with catalog corrections.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, whatsapp, catalog, meeting, feedback
